Birth of [[Alphros]]. [[Éomer]] becomes [[Marshal]]. [[Gandalf]] reads the scroll of [[Isildur]] in [[Minas Tirith]]. |- |{{TA|3018|n}}||1418||'''The [[War of the Ring]] begins.''' [[Thranduil]]'s kingdom in [[Mirkwood]] assailed by [[Orcs]]. [[Osgiliath]], and much land east of the [[Anduin]], is taken under control of [[Mordor]]. [[Gollum]] hides in [[Moria]]. [[Gandalf]] learns of the treachery of [[Saruman]]. '''[[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] reaches [[Rivendell]]. The [[Council of Elrond]] is held and the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] formed.''' |- |{{TA|3019|n}}||1419||'''The [[Quest of the Ring]].''' [[Gandalf]] falls at the hand of a [[Balrog]] in the Mines of [[Moria]]. [[Boromir]] dies defending [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] from [[Saruman]]'s [[Uruk-hai]]. The [[Breaking of the Fellowship]]. [[Gollum]] leads [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] into [[Mordor]]. [[Gandalf]] returns as Gandalf the White and frees [[Théoden]] from the hold of [[Saruman]]. '''The [[Battle of the Hornburg|Battle of Helm's Deep]].''' The [[Ents]] fight the '''[[Battle of Isengard]]'''. [[Aragorn]] walks the [[Paths of the Dead]]. Simultaneous attacks on [[Thranduil]], [[Lothlórien]] and [[Gondor]]. '''The [[Battle of Pelennor Fields]]'''. Deaths of [[Denethor|Denethor II]], [[Théoden]] and the [[Witch-king]] of Angmar. Assault upon [[Dale]] and [[Erebor]]. Deaths of [[Dáin II Ironfoot|Dáin II]] and [[Brand]]. '''The [[Battle of the Morannon]]. [[The One Ring]] destroyed. End of [[Sauron]].''' [[Nazgûl]] destroyed. Death of [[Gollum]]. [[Bard II]] becomes [[King of Dale]]. [[Thorin III Stonehelm]] becomes [[King of Erebor]]. [[Éomer]] becomes the eighteenth [[King of Rohan]]. [[Aragorn]] takes the name ''Elessar'' and the [[Sceptre of Annúminas|Sceptre]] of the [[Reunited Kingdom]], becoming the thirty-fourth [[King of Gondor]] and the first High King of the [[Reunited Kingdom]]. [[Mirkwood]] renamed [[Eryn Lasgalen]]. [[East Lórien]] founded. '''The [[Battle of Bywater|Scouring of the Shire]].''' Deaths of [[Lotho Sackville-Baggins]], [[Saruman]], and [[Gríma]] Wormtongue. [[Éomer]] and [[Lothíriel]] wed.{{App|Mark}} '''[[Elrond]], [[Galadriel]], [[Gandalf]], [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] pass over the [[Belegaer|Sea]].'''{{App|Chief}}{{App|Later}}In the reckoning of [[Gondor]], for record-keeping purposes, the [[Fourth Age]] began on [[25 March]] of {{TA|3021}}. The Third Age was held to have actually ended when the [[Three Keepers]] departed over the Sea on [[29 September]] of 3021.
